description: Supply NPTC trained Arborists to reduce lateral growth by approximately 6m on group of conifer and beach trees approximately 8-12m high on boundary of site (G1 on Map) to ensure limbs are not overhanging service yard or roof of BP building. Operatives to access trees via rope and harness methods. All limbs to be control dropped given the location. Limb overhanging Customer waiting area to be cut back to main tree stump, leaving the tree balanced. All lateral reduction work undertaken will ensure tree remains balanced. All green waste generated from work to be chipped on site and removed to a licenced waste facility. Please note that BP will have to seek written consent from the land owners in order to carry out the works as the trees are not located within BP's Site boundary and operatives will need to access trees from their land.
